name: Mayfly PI
description:
You manage a detective business, but the Bureau of Business has forced you to only hire mayflies! They don't expect much pay, but they don't live long either. Can you increase the company's reputation by hiring and managing mayfly PIs? Controls (rebindable) PausePContinueLeft Click or Space Credits

Code: Bix Men

Art: unseconds

Audio: Tucker Hux Murray
